pages.text: Alchemy is the art of using Mana to transform various things into other things.$(br2)The first thing that comes to mind might be boiling ingredients in a crucible or converting them on a pedestal, but there are many other methods.

pages.title: What You Need for Alchemy
pages.text: Assuming you don't have any devices yet, here are the items needed to start "Zardius Alchemy," which you can craft yourself.

pages.title: Zardius Alchemy Crucible
pages.text: Think of it like a cooking pot.$(br)You put ingredients inside and boil them to perform Alchemy.

pages.title: Heat Source
pages.text: Place a heat source right under the crucible to bring it to a boil. This is essential for the crucible.

pages.title: Water or Other Liquids
pages.text: This goes without saying, but water is required for this Alchemy.

pages.title: Materials to Use
pages.text: The materials you need depend on what you want to create, so make sure to check carefully.

pages.title: Mana
pages.text: The key to Alchemy. Nothing happens if you forget to add this. Sometimes, instead of Mana, you use Alchemical Aspects. (At first, use fluorite charged with Mana.)

pages.title: Common Failures in Alchemy
pages.text: Alchemical Aspects created by Alchemy are extremely unstable compared to Mana, and if you're careless, explosions and other incidents happen frequently.$(br2)If no reaction occurs, check if the quantities other than liquids are incorrect.$(br)Don't force reactions, as accidents can happen.

pages.title: More Detailed Explanation
pages.text: Alchemical Aspects are also used in Magic, and almost all offensive spells shoot Alchemical Aspects.$(br2)Because Alchemical Aspects quickly transform into other energies, they have enormous destructive power upon impact compared to Mana.$(br2)This is why accidents happen, but Alchemical Aspects made by Alchemy can be safely contained in tourmaline or quartz.

When Alchemical Aspects transfer to other objects, part of them changes into another form of energy.$(br2)For example, the Ember Aspect becomes heat, the Phantom Aspect becomes light.$(br2)This allows various processing of materials.$(br)In a way, they act like the "fuel" of Alchemy.
